Class Hero

java.lang.Object
characters.Character
characters.Hero
All Implemented Interfaces:
combat.Combatant
Direct Known Subclasses:
Mutant, Specialist
public abstract class Hero extends Character
Representa o heroi principal Herda os atributos e comportamento de Character porem possui novos getters

    Hero(String name, int healthPoints, int willPoints, int strength)
    No heroi, inicializa ele no level 1, com 0 de exp, sem sorte(luck) e adiciona uma nova acao: "Special Skill"
